title: DynamicShield
info: A more integrated Dynamic Shield has been combined with distinctive T-shaped headlights to offer functional beauty and    an advanced look

title: Hexaguard Horizon
info: The horizontally-themed T-shaped tail lights provide a wide-bodied look that emphasizes the sense of stability, and the high positioning improves visibility while asserting the SUV image

title: Horizontal Axis
info: The horizontally-themed instrument panel offers a sense of and a broad field of vision, and makes it easy to find a comfortable driving position
